name: Chip (itch) (youraverageamir)
description:
A simple arcade-style game where you have to stay on a moving square while dodging projectiles, while trying to get the highest score you can. I originally didn't intend to upload this anywhere, but I thought that the game was finished enough that I could put up on a website that allows amateur projects. Any feedback is appreciated, since this is the first time I've put up one of my games publicly. Made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5

(Music is from the game MULE, not sure if it's actually allowed because its copyrighted, if that's the case i'll remove it :I )
